resources.string:
With AnkiDroid, you can efficiently learn large amounts of vocabulary or any other material. AnkiDroid shows you the things to learn just before you forget them.

To get a first impression of how everything works, we recommend to start with a tutorial deck, which will give you some initial information, and try a bit out. Just click on "Start Reviewing" after having opened it.

Create the tutorial deck now?
Database telah diperiksa dan dioptimalkan. \nMenyusut sebanyak %d kb
Apakah Anda yakin akan menghapus semua kartu di %s?
Are you sure you wish to send all cards in %s back to their original decks?
Versi baru AnkiDroid ada di Android Market.\n\nAnda ingin memasangnya?
Jangan beritahu saya tentang kemaskini ini lagi
This resets the learning progress for all cards of this note (they will look like new cards).\nReally continue?
All cards of this note reset

An error occurred while writing to the collection. This could be related to a corrupt database or to insufficient disc space.

If it happens more often, please try to check the database, repair the collection or restoring it from a backup. Click on 'options' for that.

Nevertheless, it could be an AnkiDroid bug as well; please report the error that we can check this.
Do you really want to try to repair the database?\n\nBefore starting the attempt, a copy will be created in subfolder \'%s\'.
To add cards to AnkiDroid remove all Notepad categories or add one named \'default\'
Increase today\'s new card limit by
Review cards forgotten in last x days:
Select x cards randomly from the deck:
Preview new cards added in the last x days:

Be aware that this will export your current collection to a file called \'%1$s\' and will create a new one from your old anki 1.x files. If desired, you can manually re-import the above apkg file after completing the wizard. Do you really want to continue?
Version 2 of AnkiDroid uses a new format for decks.\nIf you did not successfully upgrade your decks, you can restart the upgrade now to upgrade your decks.

Ini adalah update besar untuk Ankidroid dan proses upgrade akan memakan waktu setidaknya 10-20 menit.

Anda ingin melanjutkan sekarang atau nanti?

Info lebih lanjut
Please start Ankidroid again when you have time to upgrade!

The recommended upgrade method is to sync with a PC and upgrade with the desktop version of Anki.

There is also an alternative method where you can upgrade over the internet if you do not have access to a PC, and your collection is not too big.
You can exit the upgrade wizard without importing your old cards by clicking the exit button below.
You can create a new empty collection by clicking below.
If you want to downgrade back to AnkiDroid 1 then please read these instructions.
Apakah Anda yakin ingin melakukan ini? Data lama Anda tidak akan diimpor.

This upgrade method is not recommended if you used media files, or have a big collection!

Your Anki1 decks will be zipped and uploaded to AnkiWeb, and the converted collection will then be downloaded.

Please note that a stable internet connection is required, and that there is a 50MB file limit.

Users of Anki Desktop are strongly encouraged to use the PC based upgrade method.

Do you still want to proceed?

If you currently have an up-to-date version of your AnkiDroid collection in the Anki desktop software, you can upgrade from there and then download your upgraded collection by syncing with AnkiWeb.

Alternatively, you can copy your AnkiDroid collection to your PC using USB, then upgrade the collection and copy back to AnkiDroid.

Please install and start Anki Desktop version 2.0.4 or greater to upgrade your collection, then sync your upgraded collection with AnkiWeb and press the "Download" button.

More detailed information on upgrading using AnkiWeb

Please copy all of your *.anki files (and any *.media folders) from your AnkiDroid folder to your Anki Desktop folder, and then install and start Anki Desktop version 2.0.4 or greater to upgrade your collection.

When the upgrade is completed, please export your collection from Anki2 and copy the collection.apkg file to your AnkiDroid folder and press the Import button below.

More detailed information on upgrading using USB.
The upgrade attempt was cancelled, please try again one of the available upgrade methods.
The upgrade process was unsuccessful. Please try again, or choose a different upgrade method
The total compressed size of your Anki1 decks exceeds the limit that the server can process (50 mb), please try upgrading with a different method.

The upgrade was completed, but there was an error while unpacking the resulting collection, please ensure that you have enough available disk (needed %1$d mb) and try again, or try upgrading with a different method.
Your old collection has been successfully exported, proceeding with the upgrade process.
Error during the export of your old collection. Would you like to continue with the upgrade process anyway (your old collection will be lost)?
Are you sure you have upgraded your collection with Anki Desktop 2 and synced with AnkiWeb?

• Unpacking archive %1$s
• Import of notes %2$d%%
• Import of cards %3$d%%
• Cleanup %4$s

string-array.name: about_content
string-array.item:
%1$s:
Kad imbas untuk Android

AnkiDroid ialah kad imbas yang juga serasi dengan perisian destop Anki. Anda boleh reka, muat turun dan belajar di antara dua perisian ini.
Bantu kami memperbaiki AnkiDroid dengan melapor bug di sini; Cadangan baru dijemput! Guna wiki dan bincang di dalam forum.
AnkiDroid software terbuka, jadi semua orang dijemput untuk serta dan menyumbang:-)
Orang ramai boleh membantu, seperti dengan alih bahasa AnkiDroid, mengemas wiki dan gambar, menderma kepada Anki Desktop, atau blogging pasal AnkiDroid!
AnkiDroid tertakluk kepada Lesen GNU-GPL v3 dan kod sumber disimpan di sini.
